pages.text: When you are running out of time in The Vault, you are able to extend your time by eating $(l)Vault Fruit$(). Vault Fruit grants additional time, but with a penalty. Vault Fruits cannot be eaten when the Modifier $(l)Rotten$() is active.
A $(l)Sweet Kiwi$() grants $(l)10 additional seconds$() to the Vault Timer while reducing the players health with 10% of maximum health.
A $(l)Bitter Lemon$() grants $(l)30 additional seconds$() to the Vault Timer while reducing the players health with 10% of maximum health.
A $(l)Mystic Pear$() grants $(l)5 additional minutes$() to the Vault Timer, while reducing the players health with 10% of maximum health with also applying wither effect or poison effect.
